title: Does society come before self? - Quora

response.answer_text: Society should be self we should feel one with all humans, all life and the universe itself, as the faulty right brain becomes overactive in early childhood and anxiety develops we start to lose this feeling. I practice EGMi and with high left brain logical/positive thought and low right brain use I feel one with society, in this state of mind any system any “ ism “ will work for the benefit of all.
According to JFK, ask not what your country can do for you, but what we can do for your country! Only in the” words “of politicians. TY4TQ and happy holidays
